Method Detail

testVerbParticle

public void testVerbParticle()
Some tests to check for an early bug which resulted in reduplication of verb particles in the past tense e.g. "fall down down" or "creep up up"

Tests for the tense and aspect.

testClausalComp

public void testClausalComp()
Test VP with sentential complements. This tests for structures like "said that John was walking"

testCoordination

public void testCoordination()
Test VP coordination and aggregation:
  1. If the simplenlg.features of a coordinate VP are set, they should be inherited by its daughter VP;
  2. 2. We can aggregate the coordinate VP so it's realised with one wide-scope auxiliary
